name: Clone website and checked if the settings are preserve
description:
As a user
I should be able to create a new website, clone the website and verify the cloned website

elements.name: Create a new website, clone the website and verify if all the settings from the original site matches the cloned site

steps.name: I go to canvas 'webbuilder' website
I login as a 'site builder'
I create a website with all default values
I navigate to edit website page
I click on start editing button if the popup is displayed
I click on the editor menu button
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Primary Settings' option from 'Website' mainmenu

I update the below website settings in the table:
| domain    | example.test |
| Site Type | QA/Testing   |
I note all the primary settings for the 'original' site
I select 'Website Defaults' option from 'Content' mainmenu

I update the below website settings in the table:
| GCMA                | 123456789      |
| Brand               | ACCUPRIL       |
| country             | Australia      |
| audiences           | Internal       |
| Audience Speciality | Administrators |
| Therapeutic Area    | Dermatology    |
| Indications         | Acne           |
I note all the website defaults for the 'original' site
I click on website pages button
I add a basic new page 'NewPage1' to the website
I click on the editor menu button
I verify if the page 'NewPage1' is created
I add a basic new page 'NewPage2' to the website
I click on the editor menu button
I verify if the page 'NewPage2' is created
I note all the pages for the 'original' site
I wait for '3' seconds
I navigate to webbuilder dashboard page
I search for the created website
I click on clone website
I clone the created website with name 'New_Version_Cloned'
I close the message window with message 'Duplication job for website'
I wait for '3' seconds
I refresh the page
I search for the cloned website
I click on open canvas editor
I click on start editing button if the popup is displayed
I wait for alert with title 'New version is in progress' to disappear
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Primary Settings' option from 'Website' mainmenu
I note all the primary settings for the 'cloned' site
I select 'Website Defaults' option from 'Content' mainmenu
I note all the website defaults for the 'cloned' site
I click on website pages button
I note all the pages for the 'cloned' site
I verify that all noted details of the 'cloned' site match the 'original' site
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Versions' option from 'History and Structure' mainmenu
I verify that there is only '2' version present in version list
I navigate to webbuilder dashboard page
I delete the website 'New_Version_Cloned'

I login as a 'site builder'
I navigate to webbuilder dashboard page
I search for website 'wb_automation_swe_style_sharing_parent'
I click on open canvas editor
I click on the editor menu button
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Custom Blocks' option from 'Content' mainmenu
I edit the created block 'footer note'
I wait for '3' seconds
I clear canvas
I add item 'Card with Footer' from 'Cards' category and verify if it is added
I change the background 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.3)' of 'HELIX-CARD' and share it with children
I click on website pages button
I refresh the page
I click on website pages button
I wait for '5' seconds
I verify that all the pages have same swe styling
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Hierarchy' option from 'History and Structure' mainmenu
I open the website 'wb_automation_swe_style_sharing_child_CANDEV-12877' from hierarchy
I switch to the last tab
I click on the editor menu button
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Custom Blocks' option from 'Content' mainmenu
I click on get latest changes button
I click on website pages button
I verify that all the pages have same swe styling

name: Verify columns in delete website page.

steps.name: I go to canvas 'webbuilder' website

I verify if the sitename column is not empty for the first page

name: Verify if a user can go back to edit page from feedback phase.

elements.name: The user should be able to make new edits after feedback phase is completed.

steps.name: I go to canvas 'webbuilder' website
I login as a 'site builder'
I create and open a website with all default values
I click on start editing button if the popup is displayed
I click on the editor menu button
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Website Defaults' option from 'Content' mainmenu

I update the below website settings in the table:
| GCMA                | 123456789      |
I click on website pages button
I click on edit page button
I add item 'Header' from 'Typography' category and verify if it is added
I save the block value
I initiate deployment process by clicking on Generate Preview button
I wait for '2' seconds
I select 'Editor' Phase link
I wait for 'Editor' phase to complete
I select 'Get Feedback' Phase button
I select 'Feedback' Phase link
I wait for 'Feedback' Phase to complete
I wait for '2' seconds
I go back to make new edits page
I wait for '2' seconds
I close the message window with message 'Deployment to the Review environment has completed'
I click on edit page button

name: Verify page panel UI changes without page refresh when delete or hide action is done.

elements.name: Page actions should effect without page refresh

steps.name: I go to canvas 'webbuilder' website
I login as a 'site builder'
I navigate to webbuilder dashboard page
I search for website 'wb_automation_page_action_refresh'
I click on open canvas editor
I click on the editor menu button
I wait for '2' seconds
I add a basic new page 'new_page' to the website
I wait for '2' seconds
I click on the editor menu button
I select setting option 'Hide' for page 'new_page'
I wait for pages on left side bar to load
I verify that the page 'new_page' is hidden
I select setting option 'UnHide' for page 'new_page'
I wait for pages on left side bar to load
I verify that the page 'new_page' is not hidden
I select setting option 'Delete' for page 'new_page'
I wait for pages on left side bar to load
I verify that the page 'new_page' is not present

name: Versions Bugs - Test
description:
As an user
I want to be able to verify versions settings

elements.name: Verify that the warning message is not shown when user editing a active version of a website

steps.name: I go to canvas 'webbuilder' website
I login as a 'site builder'
I navigate to webbuilder dashboard page
I search for website 'wb_automation_active_inactive_site_uk'
I click on open canvas editor
I switch to the last tab
I click on the editor menu button
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Versions' option from 'History and Structure' mainmenu
I edit the version 'version3'
I switch to the last tab
I verify banner text is 'You are editing a non active version of your website. Deployments are not possible until you mark it as active.'
I switch to the previous tab
I make 'version3' as the active version
I click on the editor menu button
I verify there is no banner
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Versions' option from 'History and Structure' mainmenu
I make 'Imported Version' as the active version

name: page setting bugs - Test
description:
As an tester
I want to test page settings
so that its bug free

elements.name: verify page description is mandatory when checkbox Mandate page description is checked

steps.name: I go to canvas 'webbuilder' website
I login as a 'site builder'
I navigate to webbuilder dashboard page
I search for website 'wb_automation_page_description'
I click on open canvas editor
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Search' option from 'Integrations' mainmenu
I 'enable' the checkbox 'Mandate page description'
I verify the checkbox 'Mandate page description' is 'checked'
I refresh the page
I click on website pages button
I select setting option 'SEO settings' for page 'Homepage'
I see the text 'Page Description is required.' on the page
I update the page title to 'page with mandatory desc' in page setting
I verify the save button is 'disable'
I update the page description to 'this page is added for automation purpose and will be removed later' in page setting
I verify the save button is 'enable'
I click save
I verify that the page 'page with mandatory desc' is present
I select setting option 'Delete' for page 'page with mandatory desc'
I click on settings cog button
I select 'Search' option from 'Integrations' mainmenu
I 'disable' the checkbox 'Mandate page description'
I verify the checkbox 'Mandate page description' is 'unchecked'
I refresh the page
I click on website pages button
I select setting option 'SEO settings' for page 'Homepage'
I do not see the text 'Page Description is required.' on the page
I update the page title to 'page with optional desc' in page setting
I verify the save button is 'enable'
I click save
I verify that the page 'page with optional desc' is present
I select setting option 'Delete' for page 'page with optional desc'
